## CameraAnimation.(constructor)

Creates a new `CameraAnimation` object.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(mapView: MapView, name?: string | undefined);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  mapView | [MapView](./harp-mapview.mapview.md) | \[\[MapView\]\] which will be affected by the animation. |
|  name | string \| undefined | Animation's name. |
